about_the_game:
Join one of the three warring factions and utilize their unique commanders, units and abilities to dominate the battlefield! ANIWARS is a turn-based PvP strategy game with high impact moves and fast-paced gameplay!

MULTIPLAYER PVP

Battle it out with real players in a fast-paced environment where every move is crucial in your path towards victory! Climb the leaderboards and take your place among the best of the best!

CHOOSE YOUR FACTION

Join the Military, fight for freedom with PUNKZ or enter the Vertex organization and take humanity to the next level!

CHOOSE YOUR COMMANDER

Each faction has unique commanders with powerful abilities that can turn the tides of the battle!

COMMAND YOUR TROOPS

Units are the bread and butter of ANIWARS. Each faction have their own unique units with different strengths, weaknesses and abilities that let you outplay, outsmart or simply just blow up your opponent!

UNIT UPGRADES

As the battle goes on you earn upgrade tokens which let you choose one of three upgrades for each unit. Each upgrade will have major impact on your gameplay and let you adapt your strategy to crush your enemies!

SINGLE PLAYER

Hone your skills and try new tactics versus the AI in customizable skirmishes.
